section.indexterm: exportingDeleting documents from a folder based on a list
section.p: This function restores documents which have been deleted using the Deleting documents from a folder based on a list function.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: The folder containing the documents being deleted must be selected and documents of this folder must have been deleted using the Deleting documents from a folder based on a list function.

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p:
Select:
A folder in the folder list or a folder in the left column of the folder tree.
Restore Delete Documents from the Delete/Restore Documents based on a list menu of the Utilities menu.
You must confirm that you want to restore the documents.

section.title: Results
section.p: The documents are restored and are shown in the document list of the folder.
